survey_properties.end_message: Thank you for having the time to take our survey.

questions.question_title: 1. When do you feel at your best?
choices: During the afternoon and early evening
Less fast head up, looking the world in the face
Have one or both your hands on your hips or in pockets
Touch or push the person to whom you are talking
Your knees bent with your legs neatly side by side
Your legs stretched out or straight

questions.question_title: 5. When something really amuses you,You react with...
choices: A laugh, but not a loud one

questions.question_title: 6. When you go to a party or social gathering, you...
choices: Make a loud entrance so everyone notices you
Make a quiet entrance, looking around for someone you know
Make the quietest entrance, trying to stay unnoticed

questions.question_title: 7. When you're working or concentrating very hard, and you're interrupted, you...
choices: Make a loud entrance so everyone notices you
Make a quiet entrance, looking around for someone you know
Make the quietest entrance, trying to stay unnoticed

questions.question_title: 8. Which of the following colors do you like most?
9. When you are in bed at night, in those last few moments before going to sleep,you lie...
choices: Stretched out face down on your stomach
With your head on one arm
With your head under the covers

questions.question_title: 10. You often dream that you are...
